name: EverLightsIntegration
0:
”Alexa, Set my EverLights to Easter”
”Alexa, Turn my EverLights on Green”
”Alexa, Turn Off my EverLights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Compatible with all version 3 EverLights systems, and requires a free EverLights Account. EverLights devices can be paired to your account using the EverLights mobile app.
Use Alexa voice commands to control any number of EverLights zones including turning lights on/off, setting them to a specific color, or turning on a saved sequence!
